title: For zone plans approved under the M
clause_text: For zone plans approved under the M.L.R.C. and included in the Regional Plan, all provisions of UDCPR shall be applicable according to zone in the said zone plans.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: For zone plans approved under the M.L.R.C. and included in the Regional Plan, all provisions of UDCPR shall be applicable according to zone in the said zone plans.
